detectors.description:
balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ADRAToken.sol#46)
	- StandardToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ADRAToken.sol#77-79)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ADRAToken.sol#47)
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ADRAToken.sol#87-89)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ADRAToken.sol#49)
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ADRAToken.sol#60-65)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ADRAToken.sol#51)
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ADRAToken.sol#81-85)

fallback() should be declared external:
	- ADRAToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ADRAToken.sol#103-104)
